hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Aishah said:“Once of the things that Allah revealed in the the Qur'an and then abrogated was that nothing makes marriage prohibited except ten breastfeedings or five well-known (breastfeedings).”

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ تُحَرِّمُ الْمَصَّةُ وَلاَ الْمَصَّتَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Sucking once or twice does not make (marriage) unlawful
